nodes.text: Cargo Master Z-24 Heavy Speeder Truck

The Cargo Master Z-24 Heavy Speeder Truck was manufactured by Aratech Repulsor Company. It was a large flatbed speeder truck similar in design to the Cargo Master Z-12 Speeder Truck. It had three rear-mounted engines, a large cargo capacity and forward cab. The vehicle was the mainstay of the Greel Wood Logging Corporation ground fleet.
